title: WTT T206 Addie Joss Pitching SGC 40

posts.post_title: WTT T206 Addie Joss Pitching SGC 40
posts.post_content:
I would like to trade this Joss Sweet Cap (Pitching) SGC 40 for a PSA graded copy. Can even out a deal with $ if you have one of greater value to trade. Post or PM if you have one. Thanks for looking.
Jeff
